title: UGOmod问题
author: KingdomChen
txt_content:
我的游戏版本是1.4.7
UGO的版本是1.4.5
我的服务器（官服）是1.4.7的
求解TAT
以下是错误报告：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Everything's going to plan. No, really, that was supposed to happen.

Time: 13-2-3 下午11:36
Description: Exception occured in ModLoader

java.lang.VerifyError: (class: mod_UgoCraft, method: load signature: ()V) Incompatible argument to function
        at java.lang.Class.getDeclaredFields0(Native Method)
        at java.lang.Class.privateGetDeclaredFields(Unknown Source)
        at java.lang.Class.getDeclaredFields(Unknown Source)
        at ModLoader.setupProperties(ModLoader.java:1968)
        at ModLoader.addMod(ModLoader.java:370)
        at ModLoader.readFromModFolder(ModLoader.java:1384)
        at ModLoader.init(ModLoader.java:909)
        at ModLoader.addAllRenderers(ModLoader.java:215)
        at bbu.<init>(RenderManager.java:94)
        at bbu.<clinit>(RenderManager.java:14)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(SourceFile:259)
        at asq.a(SourceFile:56)
        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:515)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.4.7
        Operating System: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1
        Java Version: 1.7.0_05, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode, sharing), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 3890472 bytes (3 MB) / 37531648 bytes (35 MB) up to 259522560 bytes (247 MB)
        JVM Flags: 0 total; 
        AABB Pool Size: 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 0 (0 bytes; 0 MB) used
        Suspicious classes: ModLoader, ModTextureStatic, EntityRendererProxy, ...[maocat.UgoCraft.IfBlockDirection, IfBlockSearchControl, BlockCore]
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 0, tallocated: 0
        ModLoader: Mods loaded: 1
ModLoader 1.4.7

replies.author: 甜丶豆包
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 甜丶豆包 于 2013-2-4 20:26 编辑 
KingdomChen 发表于 2013-2-4 11:29 
是不是只能用1.4.5的版本？
那服务器怎么降级呢，还有我们服务器倾注了大量的心血，不想删地图啊TAT
找1.4.5的服务端，然后找原来1.4.7服务端mod的1.4.5版，把1.4.7的服务器地图放进1.4.5服务端，客户端也要换成1.4.5版，操作前注意备份数据

建议去国外论坛找找1.4.7版的mod，或者自己学学怎么写mod

replies.author: 甜丶豆包
replies.txt_content: 1.4.5的插件肯定不能用在1.4.7版游戏上啊

replies.author: KingdomChen
replies.txt_content:
甜丶豆包 发表于 2013-2-4 01:00 
1.4.5的插件肯定不能用在1.4.7版游戏上啊
是不是只能用1.4.5的版本？
那服务器怎么降级呢，还有我们服务器倾注了大量的心血，不想删地图啊TAT

replies.author: KingdomChen
replies.txt_content:
求解决方案啊
要具体

replies.author: yorlereiyo
replies.txt_content:
ugo不支持1.4.6或者1.4.7
请等更新
